description: BrainFreee is an SQLAlchemy plugin that supports object composition (as opposed to class inheritance).  Google for composition vs inheritance to get the general idea.Another way to think of BrainFreee is that its a plugin for proxying properties onone-to-one related objects.  BrainFreee uses SQLAlchemys AssociationProxy for thepython properties, only BrainFreee goes the extra step of making those propertiesquery-able using SQLAlchemys session.query() machinery.
longdescription: BrainFreee is an SQLAlchemy plugin that supports object composition (as opposed to class inheritance).  Google for composition vs inheritance to get the general idea.Another way to think of BrainFreee is that its a plugin for proxying properties onone-to-one related objects.  BrainFreee uses SQLAlchemys AssociationProxy for thepython properties, only BrainFreee goes the extra step of making those propertiesquery-able using SQLAlchemys session.query() machinery.
